name: Elemental Monster Online Card Game
summary: Elemental Monster Online Card Game is a card game on the Playstation Network. A single player competition is included with the game along with a unique online battle ticket system.
info:
• 中文名: 元素魔兽
  • 平台: PlayStation Network (PS3)
  • 游戏类型: Card Game
  • 发行日期: 2011年9月13日
